Hi all!

I've recently came back to the console version of KSP and started a fresh career.  Everything was going great until I tried to timewrap once in orbit around Kerbin. 

After finishing the timewrap, my controls are locked (unable to pitch, yaw, roll, activate SAS with O button, etc.). The only controls that I can use  are; trottle controls,  L1/R1+ triangle (to open flight options), options button to open up the menu, and camera controls.

FYI; EC is Full, I'm able to EVA but unable to go back inside the ship (using the O button) even though there's no other kerbal in the ship and there's place. I've also make trim (if any) is reset.

The only "fix" I've found is to go back to the tracking station and going back inside the ship, which is not great when you're about the do a maneuver and/or are about to crash into something.

So my question is; Is this a known bug and is there a fix to this?

 

Thanks !
